text:
"We are not, I repeat not, closing schools now"

UK PM Boris Johnson says "the scientific advice" is that closing schools across the country "could do more harm than good" in tackling coronavirus

https://t.co/uwJOIBtUWY #CoronavirusPandemic https://t.co/p4xvIBioJx
